name: Break Stuff VR
storyline: Players compete in a virtual game show by throwing, launching, bashing, and breaking stuff
summary:
Break Stuff in VR!! Smash for cash as a game show contestant. Throw and bash your way to victory!

Throw virtual objects in the visually stunning and exciting stages! Demolish an office construction site. Wreck a country parking lot. Crash apart a carnival. Shatter a china shop.

Swing baseball bats and sticks to break cool things! Bash away at fax machines and piñatas. Crush a showcase of expensive objects. Smash a fully destructible car!!

Have fun destroying virtual objects without the real clean up or consequences!
All ages and experiences levels. Easy to play, difficult to master.
Fun for everyone!
